## WorkspaceSvg.createVariable() method

Create a new variable with the given name. Update the flyout to show the new variable immediately.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createVariable(name: string, opt_type?: string | null, opt_id?: string | null): VariableModel;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The new variable's name. |
|  opt\_type | string \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of the variable like 'int' or 'string'. Does not need to be unique. Field\_variable can filter variables based on their type. This will default to '' which is a specific type. |
|  opt\_id | string \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique ID of the variable. This will default to a UUID.  The newly created variable. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel.md)
